summary.span: 命名空间包含一组可以在 Office 解决方案中的 宿主项上使用的 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: The namespace contains a set of Windows Forms controls that can be used on a host item in an Office solution.

summary.span: 其中每个类可使用特定于 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表的附加功能来扩展 命名空间中的基类。

span.span: Each of these classes extends a base class that is in the namespace with additional functionality specific to a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet.

summary.span: 例如， 类扩展 类的功能。

span.span: For example, the class extends the functionality of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以添加和删除控件在此命名空间在运行时通过使用相应的方法。You can add and remove the controls in this namespace at run time by using the appropriate method. 例如，使用方法将添加在运行时向工作表。For example, use the method to add a to a worksheet at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). 在 Excel 文档级项目中，你可以在将添加此命名空间中的控件到 Excel 工作表设计时通过拖动某个控件从**工具箱**直接到您的文档。In a document-level project for Excel, you can also add the controls in this namespace to your Excel worksheet at design time by dragging a control from the **Toolbox** directly to your document. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：为 Office 文档添加 Windows 窗体控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-windows-forms-controls-to-office-documents.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add Windows Forms Controls to Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-windows-forms-controls-to-office-documents.md). 有一些 Windows 窗体控件添加到 Excel 工作表和添加到 Windows 窗体的 Windows 窗体控件之间的差异。There are some differences between Windows Forms controls that are added to Excel worksheets and Windows Forms controls that are added to Windows Forms. 有关详细信息，请参阅[限制的 Windows 窗体控件 Office 文档上](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents.md)。For more information, see [Limitations of Windows Forms Controls on Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents.md).
